title: Bug 18335: Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
OB: When switching to a different perspective and then exiting the workbench, the contents of the perspective with the maximized view are lost.
EB: The contents of the perspective with the maximized view should not be lost when switching perspectives and exiting the workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Switch to another perspective. 
2. Exit the workbench. 
3. Open the workbench. 
4. Switch to the perspective with the maximized view.
